Sequence Information.Source: Litoria caerulea (Green tree frog); also L.caerulea/L.splendida hybrid
Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the frog skin active peptide family (Caerin subfamily)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial peptide, that adopts an alpha helical conformation which can disrupt bacterial membranes. Each caerin displays a different antimicrobial specificity.
Sequence Information.Tissue specificity: Expressed by the skin parotoid and/or rostral glands.

Literature.Title: Peptides from Australian frogs. The structures of the caerins from Litoria caerula.
Literature.Author: Stone DJM, Waugh RJ, Bowie JH, Wallace JC, Tyler MJ.
